## Data Preprocessing 

### Handling Missing Values 

First, we have to check if there are missing values,

```{r}
length(Beijing_Data[is.na(Beijing_Data) == T])
```

There are $2067$ missing values out of all $434824$ obervations of PM2.5 values

```{r}
beijing$pm2.5 <- impute(beijing$pm2.5, mean) # missing value fill up
```
